newsitem.title: UK: Depfa sets 300 mln mark 5-yr hybrid bond.
newsitem.headline: Depfa sets 300 mln mark 5-yr hybrid bond.

text.p: The following bond was announced by lead manager J.P. Morgan.
BORROWER DEUTSCHE PFANDBRIEF- UND HYPOTHEKENBANK AG
AMT 300 MLN DEM COUPON *4.0 PCT MATURITY 15.NOV.01
TYPE HYBRID ISS PRICE 99.85 PAY DATE 15.NOV.96
NOTES * 15.NOV.96 TO 15.NOV.98, THEN 6ML +50 BP WITH A
MOODY AAA LISTING FFT PAY FREQ =
NEG PLG NO CRS DEFLT NO FORCE MAJ YES
